The market is estimated to reach US$ 99.68 Bn by the year 2026 growing at an extraordinarily high CAGR of 153.80% during the forecast period 2018-2026. The current valuation is at US$ 57.90 Mn. The report covers the forecast and analysis of the Bronchial Thermoplasty on both regional as well as global level.



What is Bronchial Thermoplasty and how has it gained such importance?
What does the bronchial thermoplasty market report forecast about future trends?
Global Bronchial Thermoplasty Market: By Age Group (Years)
Global Bronchial Thermoplasty Market: By Geography

Bronchial thermoplasty is one of the most important invasive processes for asthmatic patients. This type of treatment mainly includes tissue heating through the application of therapeutic radiofrequency energy to the airway passage, thus eliminating the development of smoother muscles which comes in the way of the airway wall. Asthma patients who take numerous medications still have to suffer from asthma attacks. This is the reason why they are unable to move on with their daily lives, including going to school or work. Bronchial thermoplasty has proven to be beneficial for such people. This medical procedure also offers other benefits including fewer hospital visits, lesser asthma attacks, along with a better quality of life. Growing asthma communities on social media sites and increasing awareness of the people are some of the major positive factors influencing the growth of the Bronchial Thermoplasty market.

In the recent market research report published by Sheer Analytics and Insights Pvt. Ltd., Bronchial Thermoplasty market has been classified on the basis of its age group which includes 18 to 30 years, 30 to 50 years, and greater than 50 years. Amongst the different age groups, 30 to 50 years age group segment is anticipated to grow at the highest CAGR during the forecast period. The market growth could be attributed due to a larger number of people belonging from this age group category who generally suffer from severe asthma. As per the suggestion by their asthma specialist or physician, they choose the bronchial thermoplasty treatment for their effective treatment. Along with this, the growing disposable income of the people that is coupled with their increasing awareness towards a disease-free healthy life is further projected to boost a huge market opportunity for the global bronchial thermoplasty market. 

Based on its regional demand, the global bronchial thermoplasty market is fragmented into global regions like Europe, North America, Asia-Pacific, the Middle East and Africa, and Latin America. Among all the five major global regions, North-America is projected to hold the largest share of the bronchial thermoplasty market in the year 2018, followed by Europe, Asia-Pacific, the Middle East and Africa, and Latin America. North America holds the largest market share due to the growing number of clinics and hospitals in Canada and the United States.

Boston Scientific Corporation in October 2013 got its endorsement from the China Food and Drug Administration for its Alair® Bronchial Thermoplasty System. The system provides one with a unique and effective therapy for those patients who suffer from severe asthma and are not under the control with inhaled corticosteroids and long-acting beta-agonists. The medical process of the Bronchial Thermoplasty (BT) eliminates airway contraction, thereby reducing the severity of the asthma attacks. Also, this treatment reduces the frequency or occurrence of asthma attacks.

Some of the prominent industry players operating in the global Bronchial Thermoplasty market include brands like McLaren Healthcare and Boston Scientific Corporation.

Sheer Analytics and Insights Pvt. Ltd. have published a report on the global automated 3D printing market titled Global Automated 3D printing Market (By Product - Hardware, Software and Services, By Application- Automated Production, Material Handling, Multi-Processing and Post Processing, By End-User- Healthcare and Defense & Aerospace and By Regions) – Global Industry Analysis, Size, Share, Growth, Trends and Forecast, 2017 – 2025. Total Market Revenue (TMR) of the market is currently estimated to reach US$ 5,083.8 by the year 2025. The market will be growing at a CAGR of 52.3% during the forecast period 2018-2025. The report covers the forecast and analysis of the Automated 3D printing on both regional as well as global level.

 

 

An automated 3D printing is used for giving an immediate shape and structure of an idea or visual by implementing a program in the automated production process. The global automated 3D printing market is expected to grow at a significant rate during the forecast period owing to the rise in the demand for mass customization and large batch technology which in turn is expected to influence the OEM manufacturers to integrate their systems to automate production lines within 3D printer networks. The increasing trend for adopting automation technologies in manufacturing plants to inspect the manufacturing efficiency with software enabled quality assurance 3D technology is further expected to drive the global automated 3D printing market during the forecast period. Adoption of robots with a view to achieving high efficiency, improved product quality, and greater productivity. automation technology to accomplish efficient and fast production cycle are expected to drive the demand for automated 3 printing market across several industry verticals. Easy programmability coupled with fast production is expected to be the key reason to implement robotics in automated 3D printing market during the forecast period. Rapid verification coupled with a single step manufacturing solution is estimated to create new necessities and augment the market of growth over the forecast period of 2018-2025.

 

Geographically, the global automated 3D printing market is divided into global regions like Europe, North America, Asia- Pacific, Middle East, LATAM, and Africa. The North America region has witnessed the highest growth on the global automated 3D printing market. This is due to the presence of automated 3D printing equipment manufacturers in the US. Continuous investment in R&Ds coupled with grants from universities and government is further expected to drive the automated 3D printing market in the North America region. Asia-Pacific and Europe regions are further expected to follow the North America region in terms of growth rate and revenues owing to rapid modernization and industrialization in the developing countries of these regions. Asia-Pacific region is expected to grow at the fastest CAGR owing to massive foreign direct investments to adopt latest technologies coupled with the attempt to solidify the defense line as political unrest is prevailing in several countries that include India, China, North Korea, and few others. The usage of the automated 3D printings is also expected to propel in the Latin American, Middle East, and African region as well owing to rapid modernization across several industries.

 

In the very recent market research report published by Sheer Analytics and Insights Pvt. Ltd., a market is segmented on the basis of product, application, end-user, and region. On the basis of product, the segment has been divided as hardware, software, and services. And application segment has been further sub-segmented as automated production, material handling, multi-processing, and post-processing. In addition, the end-user segment has further been divided into healthcare and defense & aerospace.

 

Asia-Pacific region is expected to play a dominant role in the growth of the global automated 3D printing market. Technical advances coupled with market gains by OEM’s of China with the rapid adoption of automated 3D printing technology by APAC manufacturers owing to the range of 3D printing benefits such as more technical, economical and operational enhancements exceed arbitrage of labor cost. In addition, automated 3D printing mergers and acquisitions among software and hardware companies are expected to drive the automated 3D printing market in the Asia-Pacific region. The acquisition of overConcept laser and Arcamcoupled with consolidation among software and hardware manufacturers are expected to take a significant role as these consolidations will leverage an improved opportunity for further research and development in this region.

 

According to Menno Ellis, SVP Strategy and Vertical Markets, 3D Systems, “I believe that 3D printing in 2018 will see continued advancements in bioprinting of tissues and organs, enabling the greater number of healthcare applications. Also, continuing advancements in material development enabling new applications for end-part production in high-stress environments including auto, aero, consumer goods and medical/dental.”

 

Some of the key industry players in the global automated 3D printing market include 3D Systems, 3Dprinter Os, Abb, Concept Laser (Ge), Formlabs, Hp, Nextgenam, Siemens, Stratasys, and Ultimaker.

The infusion pump is a kind of device which is mainly designed for infusing drugs at lower doses at a controllable rate. It is mainly used for delivering medication or nutrients to a patient. Medications like antibiotics, insulin, pain relievers and chemotherapy drugs that are given to patients through the help of the insulin pump. Thus, it is reliable and cost effective. By producing highly controlled pressure, these insulin pumps inject a certain amount of fluids beneath the skin.

 

The growing awareness about the advanced healthcare solutions and devices for better medical treatment of the patients is creating a positive impact on the growth of the global infusion pump market. The market is getting augmented with the growing number of geriatric populations suffering from chronic diseases like Crohn's disease, rheumatoid arthritis, cancer, and others. The improvement in various healthcare devices is also making the market more demanding during the forecast period. Furthermore, these insulin pumps not only deliver precise and controlled dosages but also helps in reducing the total expense of the surgery. The flexible insulin pumps and the smart insulin pumps are the major factors influencing the global infusion pump market and its growth.

Our major goal is to make medical device technology and product solutions available, accessible and affordable for all.”

The aircraft exhaust system is one of the major components of the aircraft propulsion mechanism. The exhaust system that is present inside the aircraft co-exist with the exhaust stacks, exhaust mufflers, tailpipes, wyes, risers, and turbo exhaust transitions. Unlike other exhaust system, the aircraft exhaust systems are a multifaceted one. These exhaust systems are specifically designed for taking care of engine NHS along with preventing the melting by handling the external and internal temperature variances. The purpose of this exhaust system is to take the gases and the heat away from the engine as it could cause a sudden fire outbreak.

The aircraft exhaust system also prevents gas leakage inside the cockpit. The sudden demand for lightweight and energy efficient with less gas radiating fumes framework are the prime factors enlarging the development of this market. Advancing, expanding government arrangements in regard to adjustment of exhaust systems much of the time combined with expanded worry for fixing and substitution exercises to forestall mishaps are further augmenting the demand for the global aircraft exhaust system market amid the estimated time frame.

 

In the recent market research report that was published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the aircraft exhaust market has different segmentations. Geographically, the global aircraft exhaust systems market is divided into global regions like Europe, North America, Asia- Pacific, Middle East, LATAM, and Africa.

 

Honeywell Aerospace and GE Aviation have recently confirmed their plans for supplying a new engine with an integrated avionics cockpit for theAerion’s AS2 supersonic business jet at the National Business Aviation Association’s (NBAA) 2018 annual conference and exhibition this week. The Affinity engine would come with a twin fan turbofan and a twin shaft that would be capable of fast flying, faster than the speed of sound over the water while making a flight at the subsonic speed over the land.

 

The engine would also support the altitude ceiling of 60,000 feet. GE Aviation also plans to design the next generation Full Authority Digital Engine Control (FADEC) system for the aircraft. GE Aviation Head of Business and General Aviation Brad Mottier said that “This isn’t a case of just taking an engine and putting it in a nacelle pod on the side of an airplane or under a wing. There are two fans on this engine with the highest bypass ratio ever for any supersonic engine.”

 

Some of the major industry players in the global aircraft exhaust system market include companies like Triumph Group, Magellan Aerospace.,Ducommun, Esterline Technologies, Nexcelle, Safran Nacelles, Aerospace Manufacturing, Inc, Knisley Exhaust, Power Flow Systems, Inc and others.

node.meta_keywords: aircraft engine outsource market, aircraft engine, unmanned aerial vehicles, UAVs, airbus, boeing, market data, report
node.body:
The engine is the power plant of an aircraft which, along with producing the main thrust, also suffices for the main power requirements of the aircraft. Aircraft engines are either gas turbine driven or lightweight piston engines, except for small Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs) or generally referred to as drones. Pratt &Whitney (P&W), and Safran S.A. are the major engine manufacturers for narrow-body or single-aisle planes, while, Rolls-Royce and General Electric (GE) Aviation are the prime engine manufacturers and providers for wide-body planes.

 

Increase in Demand for Narrow body Engines

Narrow body planes such as the Airbus A320 and the Boeing 737 are in huge demand owing to the versatility and efficiency that allow airline operators make a profit flying the planes on an increasing number of routes. With such huge demand for narrow-body planes, the engine manufacturers are enthusiastic regarding the ever-growing opportunities.PurePower 1000G from Pratt & Whitney and the Safran-GE combination of the LEAP and CFM56 engines are used to power single-aisle aircraft like the Airbus A320 and the Boeing 737 and 737 Max. Rolls-Royce is putting its effort to reenter the narrow body segment which it had deserted a few years ago. Further down, the CFM56-5B is the most accepted engine for the A320 family owing to its simple and rugged architecture which offers it the highest durability, reparability, and reliability in its class. Moreover, the CFM56-7B is the engine of choice for the Boeing Next-Generation narrow body airliner. In recent days, more than 8,000 CFM56-7B engines are equipped on 737 aircraft, thereby making it the most favored engine in commercial aviation.

 

Outsource/Third Party Maintenance sector for Aero Engines

Moving forward, today, the practice of outsourcing has gained widespread acceptance. While some airline operators perform in-house maintenance tasks, the third-party maintenance sector is witnessing rapid growth. According to smaller startup airlines, contracting maintenance is much attractive because keeping a fully-staffed, fully-equipped maintenance department is quite often infeasible or even inefficient for them. As the maintenance and engineering activity is a highly profitable market, Boeing has initiated its ‘Global Services’ to retrieve margins on its maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO) services while Airbus announced its partnership with Thai Airways International and has made a huge investment in an MRO center based in Thailand.
 

  • Across the lifecycle of a commercial aircraft, an engine accounts for at least 40 to 50% of the total MRO expenditure and for a new aircraft, at least 35 to 40% of the overall cost of the jet.
  • The commercial aerospace industry reflects a rising after market, evident from the gradually increasing percentage of revenue of engine OEMs and third party suppliers from aftersales and services than new engine supplies [highlight % of revenue earned by PW, RR and GE from commercial aftersales, it should be more than 50% for each].

Insights

 

In the last 2 years, the competition among different aircraft engine manufacturers has been growing immensely in the manufacturing engineering activities. Moreover, nowadays, OEMs are moving towards more environment-friendly models like Boeing and Airbus gradually investing in these initiatives indicate their intentions. Furthermore, Boeing has its plan to perform manufacturing processes in-house rather than outsourcing. However, it can be still expected that the testing, inspection, and certification methods will be outsourced by Boeing to XX due to their significant capabilities. Moving forward, most of the civil and military aircraft are equipped with power and electrical systems provided by Safran. Moreover, some of the bracket design works and testing works are outsourced by Safran to a billion-dollar IT company.

node.body:
The global train collision avoidance system market will grow at 6.5% CAGR from 2018 to 2025, as per the latest market research report titled Global Train Collision Avoidance System Market (By components- Ultrasonic Sensors, LDR Sensors, Zigbee Device, Microcontroller, Radio Frequency (RF) Transmitter & Receiver, IR Sensors, GPS, Others. By monitoring- On Train Monitoring System (OTMS), On Train Data Recorders (OTDRs). By deployment- Collision Avoidance System in Signals, Collision Avoidance System in Railway Tracks, Collision Avoidance System On-Board. By Country-The U.S., Canada, France, Germany, Italy, The U.K., Spain, China, Japan, and India)– global industry analysis, size, share, growth, trends, and forecast, 2017 – 2025, by Sheer Analytics & Insights Pvt. Ltd.

 

 

The collision avoidance system is a kind of warning or safety awareness system that is specifically designed to eliminate the collision severity of trains. Such systems are widely used in various mining and automotive sectors in order to prevent accidents or collisions from happening. With the help of this system, detecting the imminent strike becomes possible as it alerts the driver before the onset of the collision. This system is interpolated within the train or any other vehicle for enabling the autonomous and semi-autonomous decision-making process. Additionally, this system is capable of taking automatic action without any prior input from the train driver.

 

The global train collision avoidance technology market, or the train anti-collision system market, is highly influenced by the growing demand for security from the government and also from the passengers in order to avoid train accidents through collisions. Also, the technology used in the collision prevention and warning system is helping the drivers during the low visibility conditions such as fog that could result in some major life-threatening consequences.

 

In the recent market research reports that were published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the global train collision avoidance system market has different segmentation. Geographically, the global train collision avoidance system market is divided into global regions like Europe, North America, Asia- Pacific, Middle East, LATAM, and Africa.

 

Recently, the Indian railway department has selected two companies that could install the train collision avoidance system or the TCAS in order to prevent accidents in the Vikarabad-Bidar section, a 200 km long track. It is one of their pilot projects. Kernex Microsystems and Medha Servo were selected among the top six contenders, consisting of a few multinational companies, by the Research, Designs and Standard Organization (RDSO) of the Indian Railways on behalf of the Railway Board.

 

The train collision avoidance system or the TCAS is a kind of safety device that is mainly designed to prevent train accidents. The TCAS is a combination of railway signaling data with radio communications, radio frequency identification devices, global position, software, and logic. “TCAS is developed in RDSO and it is very cost effective for us. While TPWS cost about Rs 70 lakh per km, TCAS is just about Rs 10 lakh,” a railway official said.

 

The key players in the global train collision avoidance system market include companies like HBL Power Systems Ltd., Kernex Microsystems, Thales Group, Intelligence on Wheels GmbH, Siemens AG, Bombardier Inc., and Honeywell International Inc.

node.body:
Global Artificial Organ Technology market in terms of revenue is expected to grow at CAGR of 10.1% from 2018 to 2025, as per new market research report titled Global Artificial Organ Technology Market(by-product- artificial liver, artificial pancreas, artificial heart, artificial kidney, bionic limbs, and others. By technology- prosthetics and bionics.) – Global industry analysis, size, share, growth, trends, and forecast, 2017 – 2025, by Sheer Analytics & Insights Pvt. Ltd.

 

 

The artificial organ is a kind of synthetic tissue that is transplanted into the human body for replacing a natural organ which is already damaged. This artificial organ duplicates its specific function thus helping the patients to return to their natural self as sooner as possible. The artificial organ technology and its use have helped the patients in their search for the donors. The advent of artificial organ technology has lessened the need for the donors. The purpose of such technology is to prevent immediate death alongside improving the patient’s health.

 

The Global Artificial Organ Technology market is projected to have speedy growth with the rise of the geriatric population, organ failures, scarcity of donors, and higher motor related accidents. These are not only the reason behind the market growth but are also the key factors for the Global Artificial Organ Technology market and its growth. Another driving factor is the increasing public awareness about the medical advancements. Additionally, this market also includes the transplantation of the vital body organs such as the liver, heart, pancreas, and kidney. For other organs like ears, eyes, exoskeletons, and brains, the market is known as the bionics market.

 

Among all the global regions, the North American region holds the largest market share in the Global Artificial Organ Technology market. the only reason behind this is that North Americans are technically more advanced and could also afford such expensive treatments. This type of artificial organ replacement technology also has a massive impact on the Asia Pacific market. Growing population with an increase in different types of kidney, liver and heart diseases is creating an immense growth opportunity in the Asia Pacific and other European regions owing to the rapid advancements of the healthcare units.

 

In the recent market research reports that were published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the global artificial organ technology market has been classified on the basis of its products and technology. The major products of the global artificial organ technology market include artificial pancreas, artificial liver, artificial heart, bionic limbs, artificial kidney, and others. On the basis of its technology, the market is divided prosthetics and bionics. The global market is also further bifurcated into geographical regions like North America, Middle East & Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America.

 

Medtronic, Incorporated received approval for its latest medical technology- the Guardian Sensor 3. The Guardian Sensor 3 controls insulin delivery via the MiniMed 670G system, a hybrid closed looped system. This sensor is for people aged 14 and above with Type 1 diabetes. The Guardian Sensor 3 ensures a consistent and steadfast performance required for powering the MiniMed 670G system by incorporating diagnostic technology which monitors sensor health continuously.

 

Alejandro Galindo, president of the Intensive Insulin Management division within the Diabetes Group at Medtronic said, "We are steadfast in our commitment to delivering both best-in-class clinical outcomes as well as best-in-class experiences for our customers. We are inspired by the many voices in the diabetes community who continue to shape our offerings in a meaningful way as we work to address the wide spectrum of needs within the community. We are very pleased to offer this added flexibility for those who rely on our therapies for their diabetes management needs."

 

The major industry players in the global artificial organ technology market include prominent names like Biomet Inc., Baxter International Inc., Esko Bionics, Gambo AB, among others.

Global Electrical Submersible Pumps market in terms of revenue is expected to reach US$ 20.02 Billion by 2025 at a CAGR of 5.40% from 2018 to 2025 as per new market research report titled Global Electrical Submersible Pumps Market (by types- high-temperature pumps, and low-temperature pumps. By-product- open well submersible pumps, bore well submersible pumps, and non-clog submersible pumps. By application- oil & gas, agriculture, firefighting, construction, mining, and others.  By components- power cables, three-phase induction motors, multi-staged centrifugal pump, seal chamber section, and surface controls) – global industry analysis, size, share, growth, trends, and forecast, 2017 – 2025, by Sheer Analytics & Insights Pvt. Ltd.

 

 

 

Rigging of low carbonate reservoirs, sand oil fields, and highly deviated wells have a certain common factor – the use of an electrical submersible pump (ESP). ESP raises fluids up to the surface using centrifugal force in a reliable and efficient way. The beneficial advantages of an ESP for various end-user industries, coupled with technological advancements ensure the market demand is high. Moreover, the rise in demand for rig-less implementation of an electrical submersible pump will make market have a significant growth over the forecasted period.

 

In the recent market research reports that were published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the global Electrical Submersible Pumps market has been segmented based on types, product, application, and components. Based on the types, the market is segmented into high-temperature pumps and low-temperature pumps.  Based on the product, the market is analyzed as open well submersible pumps, bore well submersible pumps, and-clog submersible pumps. Based on components, the market has been segmented into power cables, three-phase induction motors, multi-staged centrifugal pump, seal chamber section, and surface controls. Based on application, the global electrical submersible pump market has been bifurcated in oil & gas, agriculture, firefighting, construction, mining, and others.

 

The market is further segmented into geographical region North America, Middle East & Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America. North America holds the largest share in the electrical submersible pumps market followed by Middle East & Africa in the second rank, and Asia-Pacific being in the third rank holder. The electrical submersible pumps market is said to make a significant effect on the North American region. The reason may be attributed to the huge demand from oil & gas industries, and the surge in exploration activities in offshore areas. The various rise in investments from governments in sectors such as chemical, mining, oil & gas is ensuring the growth of the electrical submersible market in the Middle East & Africa region. Exploration of deepwater activities, the growing pace of industrialization along with urbanization is some of the major factors estimated to augment the market growth for the Asia-Pacific region over the forecasted period.

 

Kirloskar Brothers Limited launched an open well submersible pump for domestic and agriculture users- “KOSi” pumps. The KOSi pumps are compact and lightweight in design, it significantly reduces energy consumption to a great level, and efficiently addresses the specific requirements of the consumers. Owing to KOSi’s cathodic electro deposition coating, and high corrosion resistance, it has managed to become extremely valuable for residential consumers.

 

Mr. Ashish Tripathi – AVP, Retail Business Head, Kirloskar Brothers Limited said “KBL has an experience of more than 50 years in manufacturing high-quality pumps for Indian consumers. With the introduction of the KOSi Pumps, the Indian agriculture and domestic segments will have a better product to meet water needs.”

 

The major companies in the global electrical submersible pumps market include General Electric, Grundfos Pumps Corporation, Borets Company, Halliburton Company, Baker Hughes Inc., among others.

By application- automotive, construction, industrial, and home appliances) – global industry analysis, size, share, growth, trends, and forecast, 2018 – 2025, by Sheer Analytics & Insights Pvt. Ltd.

 

 

Mainly used for commercial purposes, electrical galvanized steel is now being utilized in the automotive, and construction industries. The vast variety of applications of electrical galvanized steel ensure the market demand remains high. The advantageous properties and attractive qualities of electrical galvanized steel which attracts a growing customer base promise the market will have a prominent and significant growth over the forecasted period.

 

In the recent market research reports that were published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the global electrical galvanized steel market has been segmented based on types, and application. Based on the types, the market is segmented into galvanized steel coil, galvanized steel tube, galvanized steel strip, galvanized steel wire, and galvanized steel sheet. Based on an application the global electrical galvanized steel market has been bifurcated in automotive, construction, industrial, and home appliances.

 

The market is further segmented into geographical region North America, Middle East & Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America. North America holds the largest share in the electrical galvanized steel market followed by Asia-Pacific in the second holder, and Europe in the third rank holder. A significant effect of the electrical galvanized steel market is being witnessed in the North American region. The reason may be attributed to the growing demand for electrical galvanized steel from the automotive industries based in Canada, and the United States. The rise of industrialization and urbanization is augmenting the market growth of the Asia-Pacific region. Furthermore, the Asia-Pacific region is estimated to dominate the global market owing to technological advancements and improvements in power efficiencies for electrical galvanized steel over the projection period.

 

Japanese steelmakers Sumitomo Metal Corporation and Nippon Steel are planning to launch a continuous line of hot-dip galvanized Steel at the Kimitsu plant in Chiba prefecture, east of Tokyo. The purpose of the new galvanizing line is to strengthen the tensile strength of the steel plate. Moreover, the galvanized steel line will be producing ultra-high strength steel plates with a 1.5-GPA strength. The production is set to start in the second quarter of 2020.

 

NSSMC (Nippon Steel Sumitomo Metal Corporation) explained: “in addition, electric cars and other electric cars are expected to be more and more into the market, because of distance and the challenge of battery weight, demand for the development of light vehicles may further growth.”

 

AK Steel recently launched a new grain-oriented electrical steel for power transformers- TRAN-COR® X. This latest grain-oriented electrical steel product aids in powering the transformer manufacturers design to higher levels of efficiency. In addition to this, owing to energy loss in electricity distribution, transmission, it reduces greenhouse gas emissions. 

 

Roger Newport, Chief Executive Officer of AK Steel said, “AK Steel is excited to introduce this new family of high permeability grain-oriented electrical steel, which represents one of the highest efficiency products available in the world. This product enables our customers to improve the overall energy efficiency of the transformers they produce.”

 

The major companies in the global electrical galvanized steel market include: Arcelor Mittal, Bohai Steel, JFE Steel, Shandong Iron & Steel, Valin Steel, among others.

Global Electrical Insulating Varnish market in terms of revenue is expected to grow at a CAGR of 5.3% from 2018 to 2025 as per new market research report titled Global Electrical Insulating Varnish Market(by-product- wire enamels, impregnation varnish, silicon insulating varnish, coating varnish, bonding varnish, and others. By application- sensors, transformers, electric tools, automobile, motors, home appliance, and others.  By a method of application- vacuum-pressure impregnation (VPI) method, trickle impregnation method, dip, and flood impregnation method) – global industry analysis, size, share, growth, trends, and forecast, 2018 – 2025, by Sheer Analytics & Insights Pvt. Ltd.

 

 

One of the most important components for products of sensors, motor, transformers, and generators are the insulating varnishes. Varnishes, in fact, are liquid insulators which aid in the coating and gluing of wires together when it is cured. The properties of mechanical integrity along with thermal conductivity are further enhanced by varnishes. Additionally, varnishes ensure security of insulation system from externally environmental factors. The wide applications of insulating varnishes in the field of electromagnetic induction such as motors, sensors, and transformers are estimated to create vast opportunities of demand and growth in the foreseeable future.

 

As electrical insulating varnishes strongly rely on its impregnation, it may be labeled as primary or secondary insulation. The rise in usage of electric devices worldwide ensures the market demand for electrical insulating varnishes remains high. A surge in market demand is expected to be witnessed in various automotive industries owing to the rise in demand for hybrid electric vehicles, and fuel-efficient electric vehicles. Furthermore, the advantageous properties of varnishes along with its ever-increasing usage in electrical devices will continue to propel the growth of the market over the forecasted period.

 

In the recent market research reports that were published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the global Electrical Insulating Varnishmarket has been segmented based on product, application, and method of application. Based on the product, the market is segmented into wire enamels, impregnation varnish, silicon insulating varnish, coating varnish, bonding varnish, and others. Based on the application the global Electrical Insulating Varnishmarket has been bifurcated in sensors, transformers, electric tools, automobile, motors, home appliance, and others. Based on method of application, the market has been segmented into vacuum-pressure impregnation (VPI) method, trickle impregnation method, dip, and flood impregnation method.

 

The market is further segmented into geographical region North America, Middle East & Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America. The Asia Pacific and North America are the two regions which hold the largest market share for electrical insulating varnish. The reason for making a significant effect on the Asia-Pacific region may be attributed to the huge demand for hybrid electric vehicles along with the growing presence of electronic manufacturing companies in China and Japan.

 

Axalta Coating Systems launched – Voltatex 1230- a new electrical steel coating. Voltatex 1230 is an organic-based varnish, with exceptional corrosion resistance, and insulation properties.

 

Christoph Lomoschitz, Axalta’s Global Product Manager for the Energy Solutions Business said, “Our electrical steel coatings have an excellent reputation for delivering remarkable performance for our customers. At Axalta we innovate with purpose. We continually strive to introduce new products to the market that offer increased benefits and extend our customers’ offerings; Voltatex 1230 is no exception. This new product complements our existing Voltatex products perfectly.”

 

The major companies in the global electrical insulating varnish market include Fupao Chemical, Nitto Denko Corporation, Dongfang Insulating, Taihu Electric among others.

Global Electrical Insulating Varnishmarket in terms of revenue is expected to grow at a CAGR of 5.3% from 2018 to 2025 as per new market research report titled Global Electrical Insulating VarnishMarket(by product- wire enamels, impregnation varnish, silicon insulating varnish, coating varnish, bonding varnish, and others. Ltd.

One of the most important components for products of sensors, motor, transformers, and generators are the insulating varnishes. Varnishes, in fact are liquid insulators which aids in the coating and gluing of wires together when it is cured. The properties of mechanical integrity along with thermal conductivity are further enhanced by varnishes. Additionally, varnishes ensuresecurity of insulation system from externally environmental factors. The wide applications of insulating varnishes in the field of electromagnetic induction such as motors, sensors, and transformers are estimated to create vast opportunities of demand and growth in the foreseeable future.

As electrical insulating varnishes strongly rely on its impregnation, it may be labelled as primary or secondary insulation. The rise in usage of electric devices worldwide, ensures the market demand for electrical insulating varnishes remains high. A surge in market demand is expected to be witnessed in various automotive industries owing to the rise in demand for hybrid electric vehicles, and fuel-efficient electric vehicles. Furthermore, the advantageous properties of varnishes along with its ever-increasing usage in electrical devices will continue to propel the growth of the market over the forecasted period.

In the recent market research reports that were published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the global Electrical Insulating Varnishmarket has been segmented based on product, application, and method of application. Based on the product, the market is segmented into wire enamels, impregnationvarnish, silicon insulating varnish, coating varnish, bonding varnish, and others.Based on application the global Electrical Insulating Varnishmarket has been bifurcated in sensors, transformers, electric tools, automobile, motors, home appliance, and others. Based on method of application, the market has been segmented into vacuum-pressure impregnation (VPI) method, trickle impregnation method, dip and flood impregnation method.

The market is further segmented into geographical region North America, Middle East & Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America. Asia Pacific and North America are the two regions which hold the largest market share for electrical insulating varnish. The reason for making a significant effect on the Asia-Pacific region may be attributed to the huge demand for hybrid electrical vehicles along with the growing presence of electronic manufacturing companies in China and Japan.

Axalta Coating Systems launched – Voltatex 1230- a new electrical steel coating. Voltatex 1230 is an organic-based varnish, with exceptional corrosion resistance, andinsulation properties.

Christoph Lomoschitz, Axalta’s Global Product Manager for the Energy Solutions Business said, “Ourelectrical steel coatings have an excellent reputation for delivering remarkable performance for our customers. At Axalta we innovate with purpose. We continually strive to introduce new products to the market that offer increased benefits and extend our customers’ offerings; Voltatex 1230 is no exception. This new product complements our existing Voltatex products perfectly.”

The major companies in the global electrical insulating varnish market includeFupao Chemical, Nitto Denko Corporation, Dongfang Insulating, Taihu Electric among others.

The Global Artificial (Synthetic) Graphite market in terms of revenue is expected to reach US$ 16.61 Billion by the year 2025 at a CAGR of 4.9% from 2018 to 2025 as per new market research report titled Global Artificial Graphite Market(by types- carbon fiber, graphite electrode, graphite powder, isotropic graphite, and others. By application- batteries, lubricants, metal manufacturing, solar panels, nuclear energy, and others.  By end-user-aerospace & defense, automotive, electronic, metal, nuclear, and others) – global industry analysis, size, share, growth, trends, and forecast, 2017 – 2025, by Sheer Analytics & Insights Pvt. Ltd.

 

 

 

 Nowadays artificial graphite is used in the solar energy storage and electric furnace steelmaking due to its foreseeable nature. The artificial graphite is more expensive than the natural graphite. The artificial graphite mainly consists of pure quality carbon content.

 

Currently, there has been a growing demand for the technologically advanced graphite applications in nuclear reactors, electronics, and others. This is the reason why the artificial graphite market is seeing a significant growth. The artificial graphite market, or, synthetic graphite market, is projected to have a steady but slower growth during the forecast period. Additionally, attributable to the artificial graphite's higher capacity and performance makes it less demanding to be relevant in specific businesses. In this manner, it is evaluated that the Global Artificial Graphite market will move forward in the following eight years.

 

The recent market research reports that were published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the global artificial graphite market has been segmented on the basis of its application, types, and end-user industry. The major end-user industry of the global artificial graphite market includes automotive, aerospace & defense, electronic, nuclear, metal, and others. On the basis of its application, the market is bifurcatedintobatteries, nuclear energy, metal manufacturing, lubricants, solar panels, and others. On the basis of its type, the artificial graphite market has been analyzed into graphite electrode, carbon fiber, isotropic graphite, graphite powder, and others.

 

Furthermore, the market is additionally fragmented into its regional demand including global regions like North America, the Middle East, and Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America. The main market position for the global artificial graphite market is anticipated to be dominated by the Asia-Pacific area. Rise in the need for graphite in the gadget division, alongside the developing interest for graphite anodes for metal assembling are assessed to be the primary supporter for the development of artificial graphite in the Asia-Pacific region. Europe is another contributor to the market development of artificial graphite inferable from the developing interest from car enterprises for carbon filaments instead of steel. Another region which is relied upon to demonstrate a promising development in the global artificial graphite market is the North-American area, inferable from the gigantic use of graphite in the aerospace and defense sector. Besides, the expanded utilization of lithium-particle batteries in the hardware area is assessed to steadily impel the market of global artificial graphite in the North American region.

 

Toho Tenax Co. Limited, recently announced the launch of a highly-shock, high-tensile, resistant hybrid prepreg along with a combination of CNT (carbon nanotubes) and carbon fiber Technology. A prepreg alludes to a pre-impregnated carbon fiber sheet with grid pitch. It is additionally utilized as an intermediary material for CFRP i.e. carbon fiber fortified plastics. This new cross breed prepreg has been embraced in the golf club shafts of Mizuno Corporation, as it gives unrivaled CFRP shock resistance and rigidity. In addition, the balanced scattering of the carbon nanotubes guarantees that the carbon fiber and matrix resin does not peel far from one another which thus makes the CFRP additional sturdy.

 

Eagle Graphite’s Deith noted that governments around the world are considering banning cars with traditional combustion engines, and said that “Yearly demand for graphite for batteries will go up from around 30,000 tonnes to as much as 60,000 tonnes over the next year. These are 30,000 tonnes of new production that need to come online just to prevent the market from going into further shortage.”
Deith also commented, “Eventually batteries will come to dominate graphite demand, and global production capacity will have to grow to over 10 times its current size before the draw from battery production even begins to slow down.”

 

The prominent market players in the global artificial graphite market include companies like Asbury Graphite Mills, Inc., Mersen Group, Triton Minerals Limited, Graphite India Limited, Nippon Graphite Industries among others

Global Humanized Mouse and Rat Model market in terms of revenue is expected to reach $172.83million by 2025 at a CAGR of 9.13% from 2018 to 2025 as per new market research report titled Global Humanized Mouse and Rat Model Market (Bymodelstype- cell-based models, and genetic models. By application- hematopoiesis, oncology, toxicology, autoimmunity, infection diseases, and others. By end-user- contract research organization, the pharmaceutical industry, and others) - global industry analysis, size, share, growth, trends, and forecast, 2017 – 2025, by Sheer Analytics & Insights Pvt. Ltd.

 

 

 

In the laboratories for modeling, the human biology and diseases humanized mouse and rat models are used. They are also known by Knocking model and are used as a replacement of mouse gene by human gene or genomic sequence. It is termed as knocking as this technology consist of the deletion of a gene from the mouse genome and then it is replaced by human ortholog or gene.

 

In rising number of application areas for humanized mouse & rat model which includes infection diseases, oncology among others is the prime factor for the growth of this market. Investment by the key players in ensuring better healthcare facilities is one of the most influencing factors for making the market more demanding during the estimated period. Increasing occurrence of cancer diseases, surge in the production of monoclonal antibodies along with the stem cell exploration are some other factors contributing towards the growth of the humanized mouse & rat model market.

 

From the past few years, the global humanized mouse and rat market is dominated by North-America. The major reasons for which the demand for humanized mouse and rat model is increasing are the growth in monoclonal antibody production, preclinical activities by CROs and pharmaceutical R&D. The market is growing also owing to the continuous and responsible use of animals which is ensured by the animal care organizations.

 

Furthermore, it is estimated that the growth of the humanized mouse and rat model market will increase in Asia-Pacific owing to the international alliances for research and development activities conducted in China. In this alliance, China has taken initiatives for reducing the approval time for drugs, mandatory animal testing for every type of pharmaceutical drug along with cosmetics. The demand for this market is also increasing in India owing to the growth of the biomedical industry and the development of bio-clusters.

 

While emphasizing on the importance of mice in cancer research, Charles Hewett, Jackson Lab's former executive vice president and chief operating officer mentioned,"Mice are small, relatively speaking, they're inexpensive to house, they're inexpensive to feed and, best of all perhaps, they breed incredibly quickly. Jax pioneered the use of mice in genetic research and we believe very strongly in the importance of this work — work to solve the critical problems of human health and to identify and test better treatments."

 

In the recent market research report that was published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the global humanized mouse and rat model market has been segmented based on the model’s type, application, and end-user. Based on the model's type, the market has been analyzed as cell-based models and genetic models. The cell-based models further sub-segmented into BLT model, CD34, and PBMC. The major end-user of global humanized mouse and rat model market includes contract research organization, the pharmaceutical industry, and others. Moving forward, the market is further segmented by an application such as hematopoiesis, oncology, toxicology, autoimmunity, infection diseases, and others. Geographically, global humanized mouse and rat model market segmented into North America, Middle East & Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America.

 

Some of the major players of humanized mouse and rat model market includeAxenis S.A.S., Crown Bioscience, Inc., Champions Oncology, Charles River Laboratories, GenOway S.A., Harbour Antibodies BV, Ingenious Targeting Laboratory, and Taconic Biotechnology Co.

node.meta_keywords: CAR T Cell Therapy Market, Cancer Therapy Market, Adoptive Cell Therapy Market Size, Cancer Therapy Market Share, Cancer Therapy Market Trends, Cancer Therapy Market Forecast, CAGR, industry analysis, targeted antigen, treatment, market research data
node.body:
The Global CAR-T Cell therapy market in terms of revenue is expected to grow at a CAGR of 53% from 2018 to 2025 as per market research report titled Global CAR-T Cell Therapy Market(By Targeted Antigen – HER1, HER2, CD19, CD20, CD22, CD30, CD33, GD2, MESO and EGFRVIII, By Treatment - Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma (NHL), Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL), Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia(ALL), Multiple Myeloma, Acute Myeloid Leukemia(AML), Breast Cancer, Pancreatic Cancer, Neuroblastoma (NB), Colon Cancer and Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC)) – Global Industry Analysis, Size, Share, Growth, Trends, And Forecast, 2017 – 2025, by Sheer Analytics and Insights Pvt. Ltd. 

 

 

 

For many years, the foundations for cancer treatment has been chemotherapy, radiation therapy, and surgery. Over the past several years immunotherapy has emerged that enlist and strengthen the power of the patient’s immune system so that they can attack tumors. It is now also known as the “fifth pillar” of cancer treatment. However, recently researchers have come up with a more advanced treatment for cancer, known as, CAR-T Cell therapy.

 

What is this CAR-T Cell therapy?

CAR-T Cell therapy is a variation of immunotherapy popularly known as the adoptive cell therapy. The T cells are the type of white blood cell that is extracted by the doctor from the patient’s blood and then they add an artificial receptor to their surface. The receptor acts as a type of “heat-seeking missile” and this enables the modified cells to produce a type of chemicals that can kill cancer. Once they are infused back into the patient’s body through an IV, they start multiplying and attack tumor cells.

 

The CAR-T cell is a type of antibody that induces modular-fusion protein having an extracellular specific binding domain. This therapy has made it possible to provide treatment against recurrence option for blood cancer and other carcinogenic cases. Needless to say, today CAR-T cell in the carcinogenic therapeutics field has become a boon to the healthcare industry. Owing to this factor many companies have started investing in the CAR-T cell therapy which has increased its market and continues to do so. Presently, the most successful is the CD 19 antigen which is used for treating acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL). The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has also approved the first genetic engineering which is based on Kymriah (tisagenlecleucel) by Novartis AG. Moreover, there are also other various clinical trials on the process by using the CAR-T cell therapy which can combat another kind of tumors and acute myeloid leukemia.

 

The major reason behind the rapid growth of the CAR-T cell therapy market is because of the intensified growth of cancer cases. Furthermore, the technological advancement in this field is also contributing and creating a huge potential for the growth of the market. However, the high price of the therapy packages and the longer period of their clinical trials is proving to be a barrier for the growth of the CAR-T cell market. As per market research, no more than 150 patients will be getting this treatment in 2018.

 

As per the segmentation of the regions in the report, the CAR-T cell therapy market is segmented into North America, Latin America, Europe, Middle East & Africa, and the Asia Pacific. However, the market is dominated by North America and Europe. The demand of CAR-T cell therapy is increasing in this region owing to the rising prevalence of disease, growing awareness among the people, the increase in geriatric population, and world-class diagnosis techniques. It is estimated that the market in the region of Asia Pacific will also increase during the forecasted period. The market over here is mainly driven by the rising awareness regarding cancer, advanced diagnosis laboratories, and the initiatives that are taken by the government spread awareness among the people.

 

In the aforementioned market research report published by Sheer Analytics and Pvt. Ltd. the global CAR T cell therapy market has been categorized on the basis of targeted antigen, treatment and by geographical boundaries.

 

The targeted segment includes– HER1, HER2, CD19, CD20, CD22, CD30, CD33, GD2, MESO, and EGFRvIII; the CD19 section is predicted to grab the major share of the global CAR-T cell therapy market due to its highest success rate in detecting and treating acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL). Treatment type segment includes non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL), chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL), acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL), multiple myeloma, acute myeloid leukemia (AML), breast cancer, pancreatic cancer, neuroblastoma (NB), colon cancer and hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC). Here, the acute lymphoblastic leukemia group is dominating the other diseases.

 

Ceyland, a clinical biopharmaceutical company has focused on the development of CAR-T cell therapies, and they have announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has accepted the company’s Investigational New Drug (IND) application for CYAD-101. This will be the first non-gene edited allogenic clinical program.

 

The CEO of Ceylad, Dr. Christian Homsy told: “We are pleased to have achieved this important milestone. Celyad is the first company clinically evaluating a non-gene edited CAR-T candidate, which, we believe, offers significant advantages over gene edited approaches. Our non-gene edited program consists of a family of technologies aimed at reducing or eliminating T cell receptor (TCR) signaling without requiring genetic manipulation. CYAD-101 is part of a robust clinical development plan, establishing the foundations of next-generation CAR-T products.”

The major companies operating in the global CAR-T cell therapy market are Novartis International AG, Kite Pharma Inc., Juno Therapeutics, Cellectis, Bellicum Pharmaceuticals Inc. and Celgene Corporation among others.

In the recent times, robust growth of network monitoring tools and increasing adoption of technology by the end-user keeps boosting the user activity monitoring market globally. The devices detecting fraud features is noted to be one of the main attraction enticing the end-users, where it is used in various and numerous organizations. The rise in the numbers of cyber fraud crimes along with the internet of things is further expected to fuel the growth of this market.

 

 

The rising concern of data security and demand for internet traffic monitor and a behavior analyst in any organization are the major factors influencing the growth of the user activity monitoring market during the forecast period. Additionally, rising investment by the major players in term of technological advancement in data monitoring for enhanced end-user security solution is propelling the demand for this market. Moreover, many network monitoring tools and internet traffic monitor enhancement is more likely to surge the growth of global user activity monitoring market during the estimated period.

 

 

Asia-Pacific is expected to hold the major market share in user activity monitoring market due to rising need to control critical information matching the stringent compliances for the third-party enterprises. Moreover, surging investment by the key players for providing better network monitoring tools and adoption of cloud-based deployment within the companies to augment the maintenance and operational cost thereby reducing the management efforts are driving the European and North-America market. Presence of the large number of IT industries in the U.S, Germany, Italy, and France has raised the demand for this market in this region. The further down rapid growth of technology in countries like Brazil and Chile creates a high demand for user activity monitoring in Latin-America region.

 

 

The market research report from Sheer Analytics & Insights published on global user activity monitoring market has been segmented based on the technology, application, and end-user. On the basis of technology, the market is bifurcated into log management, visual forensics, behavior analytics, auditing and reporting, and others. Based on application, the market is analyzed as system monitoring, file monitoring, database monitoring, network monitoring, application monitoring, and others. There are several end-users of this market which make use of the user activity monitoring market which includes IT and telecom, government and defense, healthcare, banking, financial services & insurance, and others. Additionally, global user activity monitoring market is segmented geographically which includes North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific, Middle East and Africa and Latin America.

 

 

Micro Focus Launched Secure Data Sentry which aids in protecting data across hybrid IT and simplifying security of cloud workloads.

 

The general manager of the Security Products Group at Micro Focus, John Delk said “Strict privacy regulations such as GDPR, PCI DSS, and HIPAA, along with limited trust in hosted environments, could expose valuable data, anywhere it may exist. Secure Data Sentry simplifies and accelerates Voltage data-centric security deployment in the cloud, commercial, and in-house applications, without critical application changes or integration required – helping reduce the risk of deploying hybrid IT solutions.”

Some of the major players of user activity monitoring market include Balabit, Birch Grove Software, Centrify, CyberArk, Digital Guardian, Forcepoint, Rapid7, and Sumo Lodic.

Ltd.

 

 

The rising awareness of positive stem cell preservation, development of genomic analysis techniques and quality control of stem cell preservation and robust demand for cord blood stem cell banking supported the growth of stem cell manufacturing market.

 

Some factors such as increasing private and public investments along with the providing funds in the stem cell-based development, growing geriatric population, rising rates of bone marrow transplantation are influencing the growth of the stem cell manufacturing market. Furthermore, healthcare infrastructure advancement for the development of stem cell manufacturing types in a developing economy is further expected to make the market more demanding during the forecast period.

 

In addition to this, North-America is estimated to hold the largest market share of stem cell manufacturing market owing to the various reimbursement set up by the government for providing better healthcare facilities to the patients is one of the important factors which makes the market more demanding in the North-America region. Europe is also following the footstep of North-America as it is forecasted that in the next few years the Europe global stem cell manufacturing market demand will increase owing to their increase in the geriatric population and huge demand for better and precise treatment processes.

 

In the recent market research reports that were published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, the global stem cell manufacturing market has been segmented based on the types, application, and end-user. Based on the types, the market has been analyzed as hematopoietic stem cells, induced pluripotent stem cells, mesenchymal stem cells, and embryonic stem cells. The major application of stem cell manufacturing market includes drug discovery & development, allogenic stem cell therapy, autologous stem cell therapy, and cell & tissue banking. On the basis of end-user, the market is segmented into healthcare & surgical center, research organization, pharmaceutical companies among others. The market is also further segmented into geographical region North America, Middle East & Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America.

 

The professor of pathology at the Keck School of medicine of USC Dr. Cheng-Ming Chuong, is also the senior investigator of a study that was published by the Stem Cell Laboratory of the University of Southern California at Los Angeles. He along with his fellow researcher have started to discover a way through which one can grow hair follicles from the skin cells reproduced in vitro in a lab. The funding of this study was majorly provided by the National Institutes of Health and it is also published in the proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences.

 

Dr. Cheng-Ming Chuong, Professor of Pathology at the Keck School of Medicine, told in an interview that, “Many aging individuals do not grow hair well, because adult cells lose their regenerative ability. But with our new findings, we are able to make adult mouse cells produce hair again." 

 

The major companies in the global stem cell manufacturing market are as follows, Anterogen Co., Becton, Dickinson & Company, Bio-Rad Laboratories, Cellular Dynamics International, Lonza Group, Merk Group, MiltenyiBiotec, Osiris Therapeutics, and Pharmicell,

The market of the blue biotechnology is booming rapidly, and are mainly used in the healthcare, pharmaceutical sector. Blue biotechnology products are also used for the various treatment such as antiviral, bones, wounds, and uncontaminated among others and thus Global blue biotechnology market is estimated to rise in the coming years.

 

 

In addition to this, the market for blue biotechnology is also creating huge opportunities in the field of sea monitoring. Research and development by the key players for manufacturing new products which include enzymes, drug finding is also influencing the market growth of blue biotechnology across the globe. Currently, the increasing development of new aquatic technology which was used for monitoring the sea atmosphere coupled with the surge of algae-derived bioenergy development, and increasing demand for marine renewable energy are some of the major factors which are highly inducing the growth of Global blue biotechnology.

 

 

There has been considerable growth in terms of research in the Blue-Biotechnology segment. Recently, a team of biologists and researchers from the NYU Abu Dhabi collaborated with the UAE University to conduct some researches that allowed them to grow food-producing and critical oxygen-producing algae under conditions that were considered to be inhabitable for these microorganisms. As per the lead researcher, Weiqi Fu, Ph.D., Research Scientist, NYU Abu Dhabi, “With this technology, algae can be grown in photo-bioreactors at a higher density and a faster pace, reducing cost and speeding up production.”

 

 

Additionally, the increasing number of blue biotechnology products in the North-America makes the region to hold the largest market share of blue biotechnology. Moving forward, increasing focus on marine technology for the research and development of new drug has augmented the growth of this market in the countries like U.S, France, Italy, and in Germany. The constant growth of marine-based organisms such as bacteria, algae among others in Brazil, Chile, makes the demand for the blue biotechnology products in the Middle East and Africa region. The second largest market of blue biotechnology in Europe because of high demand for the marine products in this region. Due to less application of this market in several areas of India, China makes the stable growth of blue biotechnology in Asia Pacific market.

 

 

Sheer Analytics & Insights recently published a market research report on Global blue biotechnology market and the market has been segmented based on the product type, application, and end-user. Based on product type, Global blue biotechnology market is divided into pharma, biofuels, food, enzymes, biopolymers, and others. Based on its application, Global blue biotechnology market is segmented into vaccine development, drug finding, genomics, and others. There are several end-users of this market which make use of the blue biotechnology which includes pharmaceutical companies, biotechnology companies, research organization, health care center, and others. Moving forward, the market is geographically segmented into North America, Middle East & Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America.

 

 

Marinova launched marine ingredient product Maritech fucoidan and the key feature of this product is to help in boosting the immune cells and for reducing the allergic responses. Moreover, the latest study shows that this product has the ability to kill the cancer cells directly and thus it is expected to drive the blue biotechnology market in the foreseeable period.

node.body:
Sheer Analytics and Insights Pvt. Ltd. have published a report titled Global Chatbot Market (By Product- Human Intelligence, Artificial Intelligence and Marketing. By Type- Web-Based, Stand-Alone and Messenger Based. By Application- Healthcare, Media & Entertainment, Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance, Retail, Travel & Tourism, E-Commerce, and Others. By End-User- Small Enterprises, Medium Enterprises, and Large Enterprises) – Global Industry Analysis, Size, Share, Growth, Trends, and Forecast, 2018 – 2025.

 

 

 

The market is currently estimated to reach US$ 3.99Bn by the year 2025. The market is growing at a CAGR of 26.9% during the forecast period 2018-2025. The report covers the forecast and analysis of the chatbot on both regional as well as global level.

 

 

Presently, the internet has been the key platform for the various industry to market their products. Moreover, the internet is acting as a selling platform for various industries such as the IT industry, e-commerce which is solely depending on the internet for marketing and selling coupled with customer handling, and others. Communication with prospective customers for promoting products and asking for any added specification about products has become easier with the introduction of Internet-of-Things (IoT) in marketing channels. Chatbot is an automated chat box or Artificial Conversational Entity which is being added to several company websites for having a conversation with the person seeking any product or company related information by accessing the company websites without any direct call, message and emails. Upgradation in machine learning technologies coupled with artificial intelligence is expected to enhance the performance of chatbot technology.

 

 

Increasing focus of individuals regarding online messaging applications and social networking sites creates ample opportunity for the global chatbot market. Over-the-top messaging applications such as WhatsApp, Facebook messenger, Hike, Twitter, and others, are expected to withstand an increase in demand by 2025. Modernization of public and government sectors has resulted in the upgradation of marketing styles and hence, top-level managers have started emphasizing on their customer relationship management which in turn is expected to drive the Global Chatbot Market during the forecast period.

 

 

In the research report. geographically, the global chatbot market is segmented in Europe, North America, Asia- Pacific, Middle East, LATAM, and Africa. The North-America region has witnessed the highest growth on the global chatbot market. Rapid evolution of technologies such as IoT, artificial intelligence, APIs and others in the North-America region have made the region the largest market share holder. The asia-pacific market has been anticipated to follow the North America market with its increase in the modernization of the private and public enterprises to utilize the chatbot technology. The usage of the chatbot could also be seen in the Latin American, Middle East, and African region.

 

 

In the very recent market research report published by Sheer Analytics and Insights Pvt. Ltd., the market is segmented on the basis of its product, type and application, end-user and regional demand. Based on its product- Human Intelligence, Artificial Intelligence, and Marketing. Based on the type-Web-Based, Stand-Alone and Messenger Based, based on application, the market is divided into Healthcare, Media & Entertainment, Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance, Retail, Travel & Tourism, E-Commerce, and Others. On the basis of its end-user, the market is segmented as Small Enterprises, Medium Enterprises, and Large Enterprises.

 

 

 

Landbot, a one-year-old Spanish startup is taking a unique approach. Instead of just doing a robotic conversation through messages they have decided to make a chatbot-builder for businesses. The small company landed $2.2 million in a single round of funding and they decided to utilize their funding to relocate their operation to Barcelona. Instead of designing advanced tech solutions that could predict and analyze user prompts, Landbot decided to work on a simple user interface that allows businesses to create chat flows that link prompt and action, question and answer. It’s been more of a chatbot flowchart builder. And according to the company officials, the results were quite positive, and the company witnessed attractive revenue growth. Presently, the company reported that the tool is used by an attractive number of businesses in more than 50 countries.

 

 

According to Co-founder, Jiaqi Pan, “We started our chatbot journey using Artificial Intelligence technology but found out that there was a huge gap between user expectations and reality. No matter how well trained our chatbots were, users, were constantly dropped off the desired flow, which ended up in 20 different ways of saying ‘TALK WITH A HUMAN’.”

 

 

The report covers a detailed competitive outlook that includes the market share and company profiles of key players operating in the global market. Key players profiled in the report include Babylon Health, Inbenta, SRI International, Reply Yes among others.

Another change will be seen in the robotics department, where the race to build autonomous delivery robots have increased.

 

 

The global artificial intelligence sensors market has made a major impact in the Asia Pacific markets. Augury Systems launched Augury Halo, a platform where cloud-based diagnostics monitors and predicts failures for facilities of both commercial and industrial. Halo provides useful insight on the mechanical equipment in the production machines, preventing equipment failures.

 

Saar Yoskovitz, CEO of Augury said, “The Industrial IoT is changing the way the industry makes informed decisions based on real-time data. Halo shortens the time to action — from the earliest signs of malfunction to remediation.”

Global Creatinine Assay Kits Market in terms of revenue is expected to reach $270 Million by 2025 at a CAGR of 6.36% from 2018 to 2025 as per new market research report titled Global Creatinine Assay Kits Market(Byproduct type-ELISA test kits, Jaffe’s kinetic test kits, and creatinine-PAP test kits. By sample type- saliva, blood/ serum, urine, and other samples. By end-user- hospitals, research & consulting center, contract research organization, and others) – global industry analysis, size, share, growth, trends, and forecast, 2017 – 2025, by Sheer Analytics & Insights Pvt. Ltd.

 

 

 

In recent times, a rapid development in the healthcare sector for providing better treatment to the patients those are suffering from the disease like renal disorder, diabetes and other chronic diseases are fuelling the growth of the creatinine assay kits market. In addition to this, creatinine assay kits provide an accurate and convenient measure of creatinine concentration in biological fluids which includes urine, and serum plasma among others.

 

Global creatinine assay kits market is presently at a stage of thriving and has a huge potential for growth. The rising number of a geriatric population across the globe is one of the major factors for the growth of this market. Continuous growing awareness about the various kinds of healthcare facilities among the people, research and development of the creatinine assay kits by the key players are some of the key drivers which are highly influencing the growth of Global creatinine assay kit market during the forecast period.

 

Additionally, the growing number of chronic diseases such as kidney disorders, and diabetes among others are influencing the growth of this market in the Asia-Pacific and thus makes the region to hold the largest share of the creatinine assay kits market, followed by the North- America. Presence of a large number of research institutes in China and India is also an important factor which is creating a high opportunity for the creatinine assay kits market in the Asia-Pacific region.

 

As rightly pointed out by Dr. Ho Chung-ping, Chairman, Hong Kong Nephrology Group, the increasing number of severe cases of renal problems is the low awareness about CKD (chronic kidney disease). He mentioned, “If you don’t have any pain, you are not going to see a doctor.” The absence of pain in the early stage of the disease is exactly what makes it difficult to diagnose at an early stage. However, with the launch of the clinical trial of a Smartphone enabled home based urine analysis device by Healthy.io and Geisinger, the National Kidney Foundation (NKF), Danville, Pa. based health system, early detection of CKD can become a reality. As per Kerry Willis, Ph.D., chief scientific officer, NKF, “This new trial using a smartphone app and urinalysis kit will provide important information on how to increase testing for CKD in this high-risk population. Our hope is that a home-based test makes it easier for patients at risk for CKD to comply with regular albuminuria screening and that this will lead to earlier diagnosis and treatment of CKD, reducing cardiovascular risk and preserving kidney function.” 

 

In the recent market research reports published by Sheer Analytics & Insights, Global creatinine assay kits market has been segmented based on the product type, sample type and end-user. Based on the product type, the market has been analysed as ELISA test kits, Jaffe’s kinetic test kits, and creatinine-PAP test kits. The major end-user of Global creatinine assay kits market includes hospitals, research & consulting centre, contract research organization, and others. Moving forward, the market is further segmented by sample types such as saliva, blood/ serum, urine, and other samples. Geographically, Global creatinine assay kits market segmented into North America, Middle East & Africa, Asia-Pacific, and Latin America.

 

The major companies in the Global enterprise software market are as follows, Abbott Laboratories, Arbor Assays, Abcam PLC, Bioassay Systems LLC, Bio Vision Inc., Cayman Chemical, Enzo Life Sciences, Inc., GenWay Biotech, and Merk Group.
